name: Cyber Defense (itch) (elo356)
description:
Please read everything before playing, Thanks

Cyber defense is a game in which the objective is to survive as many waves as you can. You are the antivirus of a computer and you must destroy the viruses so that they do not destroy the memory

Every 3 waves you can choose an ability and leave the others.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

ESC: pause

WASD: move player

Mouse Right Click: Use special ability

Mouse left Click: Normal shot

Aim: Position of the mouse pointer

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

power Ups:

immortality: allows you not to take damage. His sprite is purple chip.

triple bullet: allows you to press the right mouse button to shoot multiple bullets in a row. Sprite chip green.

Damage Increase: Increases the damage of the normal shot. Red Sprite

Freezing bullet: Pressing the right mouse button will fire a special bullet that will slow down enemies. blue sprite.

I didn't have time to put the characteristics of the skill in the game so I put them here so that when you have the option to choose skills you know how to use them.
